# your code goes here
import math
f = math.factorial
def ncr(n,r):
	return f(n)/((f(n-r)*f(r)))
	
t = input()
for i in xrange(t):
	arr = map(int, raw_input().split())
	k = input()
	arr.sort(reverse=True)
	c = 0
	q = arr[:k]
	for j in q:
		l = arr.count(j)
		r = q.count(j)
		c = max(c,ncr(l,r))
	print c
